comment._content: See www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2478431234/ for another picture of Eleanor and Jessie.

comment.author: 66503018@N00
comment._content: How unfortunate that the girls look just like their father.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: They traveled with their father for a month's vacation on Bermuda shortly after he had been elected President of the U.S. NYT of Nov 17, 1912 describes the departure and first day aboard the Bermudian query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=990CE6DE1E3AE633A... NYT of Dec 17, 1912 describes the vacation after their return on Dec 16. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F2061EFA355E13738...
